description: The part of the Articulating Manipulator that causes the jaws or cutter to open and close.
The ability of a joint to move.  In this case, the Articulating Manipulator is able to rotate the actuator.
A float designed specifically for the Articulating Manipulator to provide addition buoyancy to counter the weight of the manipulator.
A weight designed to help maintain an even pitch of the ROV when the Articulating Manipulator is installed on the ROV.
Another name for the jaws or cutter.
The part of the Articulating Manipulator that causes the jaws or cutter to rotate.
